Description:
<0>GetVelocity - retrieves the listener's velocity.
<1>HRESULT IDirectSound3DBuffer::GetVelocity(
<3/><1>D3DVECTOR* <2>Velocity
<1>);
<2>Velocity - pointer to a variable into which the velocity vector (velocity for each of the coordinates) of the source movement in space is returned.

<0>SetVelocity - встановлення швидкості переміщення.
<1>HRESULT IDirectSound3DBuffer::SetVelocity(
<3/><1>D3DVALUE <2>X,
<3/><1>D3DVALUE <2>Y,
<3/><1>D3DVALUE <2>Z,
<3/><1>DWORD <2>Apply
<1>);
<2>X, Y, Z - new velocity vector value. Subsystem can adjust vector value in case of overflow hazard during calculations.
Name: Velocity
